basics.name: Alex Chudasama
basics.label: Mathematician
basics.summary: Mathematician with interests in biological dynamical systems. I have equal enthusiasm for the pub and playing the cello.

work.name: NEST
work.summary: Data Engineer at NEST, responsible for setting up the NEST Data Platform, relying on a Python/SQL/Spark tech stack. This catered for 14 million members of the UK population and £44 billion in assets.

awards.title: Durham Centre for Academic Development Grant
awards.summary: Awarded a grant titled 'Accessible interactive visualisations in mathematical biology' to develop a prototype reaction-diffusion simulator using parallel computation methods.

publications.name: VisualPDE: rapid interactive simulations of partial differential equations
publications.summary: Advertised the use of VisualPDE, a web-based reaction-diffusion simulator capable of solving such systems rapidly on common devices. This paper highlights examples such as morphogenesis and the spread of disease. The simulator is available at https://visualpde.com.
